name: Brakus the Shifter

skills.name: Innocent Blood
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Heals this Champion by 15% of the damage inflicted.

effects.notes: Heals self for 15% of damage dealt. Provides sustain on basic attack.

skills.book_value: Medium - +20% damage total, increases healing via higher damage
skills.notes: Self-sustain on A1 allows Brakus to maintain health without dedicated healer. Synergizes with high ATK builds.

skills.name: Full Moon Rampage (Cooldown: 5 turns)
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 6 times. Heals this Champion by 25% of the damage inflicted. Heals this Champion by 50% of the damage inflicted instead if the target is under a [Fear] or a [True Fear] debuff. After the first hit, has a 75% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: 6-hit single-target attack, 0.97x ATK per hit (5.82x total). Excellent for Giant Slayer procs.
Heals for 25% of total damage dealt (50% if target has [Fear] or [True Fear]). Synergizes with A3 fear debuffs for massive sustain.
75% base chance (100% when booked) to place 25% [Weaken] after first hit. Key damage amplification debuff.

skills.book_value: VERY HIGH - Reduces cooldown by 2 turns (5→3), increases weaken chance to 100%, and adds 25% damage. Critical for effectiveness.
skills.notes: CORE SKILL - 6-hit multi-attack with massive sustain potential (50% healing vs feared targets). Synergizes with A3 [True Fear]/[Fear]. Giant Slayer mastery highly recommended for multi-hit damage.

skills.name: Hunter’s Howl (Cooldown: 5 turns)
skills.description: Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 3 turns, then attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a [True Fear] debuff for 1 turn. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Fear] debuff on 2 random enemies for 1 turn if the [True Fear] debuff is placed.

effects.notes: 50% ATK buff for all allies for 3 turns. Buffs BEFORE attacking, so Brakus benefits immediately.
3-hit single-target attack, 2.3x ATK per hit (6.9x total damage)
50% base chance per hit (75% when booked) to place [True Fear] on primary target. [True Fear] prevents all actions and cannot be resisted.
If [True Fear] is placed, 50% chance (75% when booked) to place [Fear] on 2 random enemies for 1 turn. [Fear] prevents using skills with cooldowns.

skills.book_value: VERY HIGH - Reduces cooldown by 1 turn, increases debuff chances by 25% total. Critical for control and team support.
skills.notes: CORE SKILL - Team ATK buff + powerful fear control. [True Fear] is irresistible and prevents all actions. Synergizes with A2 (50% healing vs feared targets). Buffs before attacking, so Brakus benefits from his own ATK buff.

skills.name: Beast Mode (Passive, Cooldown: 7 turns)
skills.description: Passive Effect: Damage increases by 40% when this Champion's HP drops below 40%. Active Effect: Revives this Champion with 20% HP when killed. Immediately grants an Extra Turn.

effects.notes: Passive: +40% damage when HP drops below 40%. Makes Brakus extremely dangerous at low health.
Active: Self-revive with 20% HP when killed. 7-turn cooldown (5 when booked). Grants Extra Turn immediately after revive.
Immediately grants Extra Turn after self-revive, allowing Brakus to act again or use A2/A3 for sustain.

skills.book_value: HIGH - Reduces cooldown by 2 turns (7→5), allowing more frequent self-revive
skills.notes: SIGNATURE PASSIVE - Dual passive/active effect. Passive damage boost makes Brakus a low-HP threat. Active self-revive + Extra Turn provides exceptional survivability and allows immediate retaliation or sustain with A2.

forms.aura: Increase Ally ATK in all battles by 33%
forms.comments: Brakus has exceptional ATK aura (33% all battles) and self-sustaining kit with fear control. Self-revive passive makes him difficult to kill.

stat_priorities: 100% Crit Rate (for A1 sustain and overall damage)
High ATK (primary damage stat, scales all abilities)
HP%/DEF% for survivability (benefits from low-HP passive damage boost)

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: AI behavior is generally good - prioritizes A3 when available for ATK buff + fear control, uses A2 for multi-hit damage/sustain. No major issues reported.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Self-revive passive (5-turn cooldown when booked) + Extra Turn + massive sustain (50% healing vs feared targets) allows Brakus to solo carry content. Can repeatedly revive and heal to full with A2 against feared bosses. Excellent for Faction Wars solo strategies.

mechanics_advisory: Brakus the Shifter is a legendary self-sustaining damage dealer with exceptional survivability and control. KEY STRENGTHS: (1) Self-revive passive with Extra Turn (5-turn CD when booked), (2) Massive sustain via lifesteal on all attacks (50% vs feared targets), (3) [True Fear] and [Fear] control with 33% ATK aura, (4) 40% damage boost when HP < 40%, (5) 6-hit A2 for Giant Slayer synergy and Weaken debuff. REQUIRES BOOKS for effectiveness (A2/A3 cooldowns critical). Excellent for Skinwalkers Faction Wars (top-tier carry), Dungeons (solo potential), and Doom Tower (control + sustain). Arena: Strong cleave with ATK aura. Clan Boss: Solid with Weaken + Giant Slayer multi-hit. Synergizes with fear-based teams and benefits from ACC support.
